column4: Could nayone help me get my eth0 device working? I'm kinda new to linux and due to some reason my eth0 don't work. It don't automaticly detect my network as I havn't managed to get it to work with manual settings, and it say "device not managed".
do you haev a static ip?
Try editing /etc/NetworkManager/nm-system-settings.conf and change ifupdown to true
